title: MCP Response Synchronization Bug - Responses Lag By One Call
symptoms: Response N delivered to Call N+1
Operations succeed but wrong response type returned
Retry clears the queue and succeeds
workaround: Retry failed calls - operation usually succeeded, just got wrong response
root_cause_candidate: Response queue FIFO offset or async race condition in mcp-bridge
notes: Window WAS created successfully - confirmed by list_panes showing window 'logs'
